document.full_text: an overwhelming majority of greeks are in favor of selling and developing state assets to raise 50 billion euros ($71.19 billion) to avoid a default on the country's crippling debt load, a poll found on sunday.
document.title: greeks favor selloffs to end debt crisis: poll
lines_and_colors: an overwhelming majority of greeks are in favor of selling and developing state assets to raise 50 billion euros ($71.19 billion) to avoid a default on the country's crippling debt load, a poll found on sunday.
